main.se450.observable

Class AbstractObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.se450.observable.AbstractObserver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fire, ForwardThrust, GameComplete, GameOver, HyperSpace, Left, ReverseThrust, Right, Shield, Start, StartEndless, Stop

    public abstract class AbstractObserver
extends java.lang.Object
    An asynchronous update interface for receiving notifications about an event has occurred.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractObserver()
      The default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isObserving(IObservable iiObservable)
      To check if a observer is observing an event.
      void startObserver(IObservable iiObservable)
      This method is called when information about an event which was previously requested using an asynchronous interface becomes available, and the observer will starts to observe.
      void stopObserver(IObservable iiObservable)
      This method is called when information about an event which was previously requested using an asynchronous interface becomes available, and the observer will stops to observe.
